quotes.quote: Inside some of us is a thin person struggling to get out, but they can usually be sedated with a few pieces of chocolate cake.
You know what the secret to weight loss is? Don't eat much.
Diets are for those who are thick and tired of it.
Successful weight loss takes programming, not willpower.
Exercise is a dirty word. Every time I hear it I wash my mouth out with chocolate.
The cardiologist's diet: If it tastes good, spit it out.
Probably nothing in the world arouses more false hopes than the first four hours of a diet.
The second day of a diet is always easier than the first. By the second day, you are off it.
At the end of every diet, the path curves back to the trough.
Saying yes to the skinny jeans by saying no to the donuts.
Here's the secret to weight loss: It's all about crowding out, not cutting out.

When I buy cookies I eat just four and throw the rest away. But first I spray them with Raid so I won't dig them out of the garbage later. Be careful, though, because that Raid really doesn't taste that bad.
I have gained and lost the same ten pounds so many times over and over again my cellulite must have dÃ©jÃ  vu.
Drinking three glasses of water before every meal will help you lose weight, because you will burn a lot of calories running to the bathroom.
My doctor told me to stop having intimate dinners for four. Unless there are three other people.
My advice if you insist on slimming: Eat as much as you like, just don't swallow it.
I lied on my Weight Watchers list. I put down that I had 3 eggs, but they were Cadbury chocolate eggs.
A diet is a plan, generally hopeless, for reducing your weight, which tests your will power but does little for your waistline.
The first thing you lose on a diet is brain mass.
A diet is just code for a time when you eat food you dislike and still feel hungry.
The biggest seller is cookbooks and the second is diet books, how not to eat what you've just learned how to cook.
If you believe that weight loss requires self-deprivation, I'm going to teach you otherwise.
I'm allergic to food. Every time I eat it breaks out into fat.
I tried every diet in the book. I tried some that weren't in the book. I tried eating the book. It tasted better than most of the diets.
The only way to lose weight is to check it as airline baggage.
I never worry about diets. The only carrots that interest me are the number you get in a diamond.
The trouble with jogging is that by the time you realize you're not in shape for it, it's too far to walk back.
No one wakes up in the morning and says, I want to gain 150 pounds and I will start right now!
Weight loss is not the key to your dreams. The truth is there is no lock and the door is flimsy.
It would be far easier to lose weight permanently if replacement parts weren't so handy in the refrigerator.
Avoid any diet that discourages the use of hot fudge.
To promise not to do a thing is the surest way in the world to make a body want to go and do that very thing.
Whenever I feel like exercise, I lie down until the feeling passes.
I have a great diet. You're allowed to eat anything you want, but you must eat it with naked fat people.
I hate it when I think I'm buying organic vegetables but when I get home I discover they're just regular donuts.
A diet is when you watch what you eat and wish you could eat what you watch.
Thou shouldst eat to live, not live to eat.
It's called diet, because all the other 4-letter words were taken.
An optimist is a person who starts a new diet on Thanksgiving Day.
A balanced diet is having a cupcake in each hand.
I'm on that new diet where you eat everything and pray for a miracle.
When we lose twenty pounds. We may be losing the twenty best pounds we have! We may be losing the pounds that contain our genius, our humanity, our love and honesty.
I'm not overweight. I'm just nine inches too short.
I've been on a diet for two weeks and all I've lost is fourteen days.
Seize the moment. Remember all those women on the Titanic who waved off the dessert cart.
The heart, like the stomach, wants a varied diet.
I never worry about diets. The only carrots that interest me are the number you get in a diamond.
Chopsticks are one of the reasons the Chinese never invented custard.
We ought to have a diet salad dressing called '500 Islands.'
From the day on which she weighs 140, the chief excitement of a woman's life consists in spotting people who are fatter than she is.
I wonder if there is woman in the world strong-minded enough to shed ten pounds or twenty,— And say, there now, that's plenty.
Eat a third, drink a third, and leave empty in your stomach the remaining third. If anger overtakes you there will be room for the expansion of your stomach, and you will not suffer from apoplexy.
She's got this real funny idea about a diet; you don't get fat if no one sees you eating.

I think thou art in the habit of eating a great deal, and that thy power of restraining appetite is more slender than a hair, whilst an appetite such as thou nourishest would rupture a chain and a day may come it will tear thee up.
I'm on a whiskey diet. I've lost three days already!
A gourmet who thinks of calories is like a tart who looks at her watch.
In the course of my life, I have often had to eat my words, and I must confess that I have always found it a wholesome diet.
No diet will remove all the fat from your body because the brain is entirely fat. Without a brain, you might look good, but all you could do is run for public office.
I don't diet. I just don't eat as much as I'd like to.
I lost so much weight, people kept looking at my ankles. Why not? That's where my pants were.
I just went on a great diet. There are only three things you can't put in your mouth— a knife, a fork, and a spoon!
My wife has come up with a very simple device to make me lose weight. It's called a food bill.
Doctor, Doctor I'm on a diet and it's making me irritable. Yesterday I bit someone's ear off. Oh dear, that's a lot of calories.
Image the weight you are losing if going to the person you hate.
Vegetables are a must on a diet.  I suggest carrot cake, zucchini bread, and pumpkin pie.
Eat, drink, and be merry, for tomorrow ye diet.
We can all put weight on or lose weight.
Your bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
Don't dig your grave with your knife and fork.
Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.
A balanced diet is a cookie in each hand.
Eat as much as you like just don't swallow it.
